epic_title: Secure User Authentication with Multi-Factor Login
title: User Login with Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a customer, I want to log in using multi-factor authentication, so that I can securely access my account.
attributes_and_rules: Login module must support OTP and authenticator app for multi-factor authentication. Password recovery options should be available.
acceptance_criteria: 1. System should require two-factor authentication for access. 2. Password recovery process should be available.
test_cases: Given a registered user, when they attempt to log in, then the system should prompt for multi-factor authentication.

epic_title: Secure User Authentication with Multi-Factor Login
title: Session Timeout Handling
description: As a customer, I want my session to timeout after a period of inactivity, so that my account remains secure.
attributes_and_rules: System should automatically logout users after a predefined period of inactivity to enhance security.
acceptance_criteria: 1. System should log out users after 15 minutes of inactivity. 2. Users should receive a warning before session timeout.
test_cases: Given a logged-in user, when the system detects 15 minutes of inactivity, then it should log the user out and display a session timeout message.

epic_title: Secure User Authentication with Multi-Factor Login
title: Device Recognition Features
description: As a customer, I want the system to recognize my device, so that I can log in more conveniently.
attributes_and_rules: System should remember recognized devices for faster login.
acceptance_criteria: 1. System should remember devices after successful multi-factor authentication. 2. Users should be able to manage their recognized devices.
test_cases: Given a user logs in with multi-factor authentication, when they choose to remember their device, then the system should recognize the device on subsequent logins.

title: Responsive Design for Multiple Devices
description: As a user, I want the portal to work consistently across all my devices, so that I have a seamless experience.
attributes_and_rules: The UI must be responsive and adapt to different devices such as desktop, tablet, and mobile. Maintain a unified brand experience.
acceptance_criteria: 1. UI should display correctly on all screen sizes. 2. Usability must be consistent across devices.
test_cases: Given different devices, when users access the portal, then the UI should adapt seamlessly to the respective screen size.

title: Accessibility Compliance
description: As a user, I want the portal to be accessible for individuals with disabilities, so that everyone can use it effectively.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure compliance with accessibility standards such as WCAG 2.1.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Portal must be navigable via screen readers. 2. Ensure high contrast and scalable fonts for readability.
test_cases: Given a user with accessibility needs, when they use the portal, then all accessibility features should work without any issues.

epic_title: Personalized Dashboard and Product Eligibility Display
title: Personalized Account Overview
description: As a user, I want to see a personalized overview of my accounts, so that I can quickly access important information.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard should display account summaries and personalized information based on user data.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard must reflect real-time account information. 2. Personalization should based on user's profile and preferences.
test_cases: Given a logged-in user, when they view the dashboard, then it should show a personalized summary of their accounts.

epic_title: Personalized Dashboard and Product Eligibility Display
title: Display Product Eligibility
description: As a user, I want to see products I am eligible for, so that I can take advantage of relevant offers.
attributes_and_rules: Eligibility information must be displayed accurately based on the user's profile and account status.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Eligible products should be updated in real-time based on data synchronization. 2. Users should see specific reasons for their eligibility.
test_cases: Given a user's profile data, when they view the dashboard, then it should show their eligible products and services.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
title: Guided Account Opening Workflow
description: As a user, I want a guided workflow to open a new account, so that I can do it easily and efficiently.
attributes_and_rules: Workflow should have clear steps and dynamic validations to reduce errors.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Account opening should be streamlined with minimum steps. 2. Dynamic validations must ensure correct information submission.
test_cases: Given a user opening an account, when they follow the guided steps, then the process should be smooth and error-free.

title: Real-time Request Tracking
description: As a user, I want to track my service request status in real-time, so that I know the progress of my request.
attributes_and_rules: System must provide real-time updates on request status and send notifications upon status changes.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users should see real-time request statuses. 2. Notifications must be sent via email or portal alerts for each status change.
test_cases: Given a user's submitted request, when its status changes, then the system should update the status in real-time and send a notification.

epic_title: Document Upload and Application Continuation Feature
title: Secure Document Upload
description: As a user, I want to securely upload documents, so that my information is protected.
attributes_and_rules: Document upload feature must support multiple file formats and handle size validations. Implement security measures like encryption and secure storage.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users must be able to upload documents securely. 2. System should validate file formats and sizes.
test_cases: Given a document upload feature, when users upload files, then the system should validate and store the documents securely.
